text: Three Guys Named Mike is a 1951 American romantic comedy movie directed by Charles Walters. It stars Jane Wyman, Van Johnson, Howard Keel, Barry Sullivan and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. == Other websites == * * * * Category:1951 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Charles Walters
title: Three Guys Named Mike
